original: thabs shes sgron ma bzhugs so //
analyzed: thabs shes sgron ma bzhugs so

analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin rig ba rnal byor ba

analyzed: mtho ba thob phyir brtson ba mi byed kyang

analyzed: snying rje bye brag thabs kyi spyod ba ston

analyzed: ji ltar mkha la ja tshon rnam mang yang

analyzed: ye shes dbyings su ro gcig bye brag med

analyzed: yun ring dus nas rmongs ba sems can rnams

analyzed: bdag tu dzin ba sems brgyud so sor snang

analyzed: ye shes log rtogs khyad ba bsam yas kyang

analyzed: sgyu ma yin phyir rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam

analyzed: sems can sangs rgya bden ba tshul gcig cing

analyzed: rang gi sems nyid sangs rgya yin shes na

analyzed: gzhan nas sgrub ba byed ba ci yang med

analyzed: de lta ba na spong ba byed ba med
